mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity (activity_id, activity_name, activity_desc, begin_date_time, end_date_time, stock_count, stock_surplus_count, take_count, strategy_id, state, creator, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{activityId}, #{activityName}, #{activityDesc}, #{beginDateTime}, #{endDateTime}, #{stockCount}, #{stockSurplusCount}, #{takeCount}, #{strategyId}, #{state}, #{creator}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT activity_id, activity_name, activity_desc, begin_date_time, end_date_time, stock_count, stock_surplus_count, take_count, strategy_id, state, creator, create_time, update_time FROM activity WHERE activity_id = #{activityId}
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET stock_surplus_count = stock_surplus_count - 1 WHERE activity_id = #{activityId} AND stock_surplus_count > 0
mapper.select: SELECT activity_id, activity_name, begin_date_time, end_date_time, state, creator FROM activity WHERE id >= #{id} AND state in (4,5) ORDER BY ID ASC LIMIT 10
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET stock_surplus_count = #{stockSurplusCount} WHERE activity_id = #{activityId} AND stock_surplus_count > #{stockSurplusCount}
